We miss you! NOW BUY SOMETHING.

Here's a stream of messages from various companies telling me that they miss me.   I never call, never write, and most importantly, I don't follow their calls to action.  Alas, email marketer, you don't miss me.  You don't even know me.  So quit it with the guilt trips.
